system.description: You gain an expertise die on poisoner’s kit checks. With 10 minutes of experimentation you can identify a dose of a poison and learn the recipe to make it. You can use your poisoner’s kit and spend a day creating the poison for half its cost. At the Narrator’s discretion, you may be able to learn the recipe for poisons which don’t appear in Chapter 7: Maladies in Trials & Treasures.
